name: vectra (Stevenic)
description: [项目级] Vectra is a local vector database for Node.js with features similar to pinecone but built using local files.。来源: https://github.com/Stevenic/vectra

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: Vectra is a file‑backed, in‑memory vector database for Node.js. It works like a local [Pinecone](https://www.pinecone.io/)  [Qdrant](https://qdrant.tech/): each index is just a folder on disk with an `index.json` file containing vectors and any metadata fields you choose to index; all other metadata is stored per‑item as separate JSON files. Queries use a Pinecone‑compatible subset of [MongoDB‑style operators](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/operator/query/) for filtering, then rank matches by cosine similarity. Because the entire index is loaded into memory, lookups are extremely fast (often <1 ms for small indexes, commonly 1–2 ms for larger local sets). It’s ideal when you want simple, zero‑infrastructure retrieval over a small, mostly static corpus. Pinecone‑style namespa

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
- npm: `npm install vectra`
- yarn: `yarn add vectra`

CLI usage
- Run without installing globally: `npx vectra --help`
- Optional global install: `npm install -g vectra` (then use `vectra --help`)
